element.description: Overrides the default element name to apply unique styles with the Customization Provider.

hasError.description: Sets the textarea to an error state.

height.description: The height of the textarea is strictly controlled by the component

id.description: Sets the id of the textarea. Should match the htmlFor of `Label`.

insertAfter.type:
| string
  | number
  | boolean
  | ReactElement<any, string | JSXElementConstructor<any>>
  | ReactFragment
  | ReactPortal
insertAfter.description: Ability to insert icon or other element to the left of the textarea.

insertBefore.type:
| string
  | number
  | boolean
  | ReactElement<any, string | JSXElementConstructor<any>>
  | ReactFragment
  | ReactPortal
insertBefore.description: Ability to insert icon or other element to the right of the textarea.

maxRows.description: Adjust how big the textarea should grow as the user types into it.

name.description: Sets the name of the textarea.

placeholder.description: Sets the placeholder of the textarea.

resize.description: Sets the resize property of the textarea. We only support vertical resizing.

size.description: The size of the textarea is strictly controlled by the component

variant.description: Choose between default or inverse styles for the textarea.

width.description: The width of the textarea is strictly controlled by the component
